author: FE Online
title: Smriti Irani exposes Tehseen Poonawalla for online misogyny, check out the top Twitter reactions
text:
Smriti Irani exposes Tehseen Poonawalla for online misogyny, check out the top Twitter reactions Smriti Irani exposes Tehseen Poonawalla for online misogyny, check out the top Twitter reactions On Saturday evening, BJP leader and Union Minister Smriti Irani shocked the nation by showing a 'sexist' tweet that she claimed was made by Tehseen Poonawalla. By: FE Online | New Delhi | Published: February 5, 2017 3:21 PM Smriti Irani exposed Tehseen Poonawalla for online misogyny. (Source: AP) 
On Saturday evening, BJP leader and Union Minister Smriti Irani shocked the nation by showing a ‘sexist’ tweet that she claimed was made by Tehseen Poonawalla. The tweet was from February 2016, when the decision to hoist India’s flag at every University was taken and according to Irani, in the post-Poonawalla had asked her to ‘erect’ a 56-inch pole at every University with a condom on it. 
You may also want to watch: 

Twitterati was quick to take on Poonawalla and blasted him for making disrespectful and sexist comments. People shared the screenshot of that tweet and other posts from Poonawalla where he said something women. Here are the top reactions: 
Madam @mvadera , your husband @tehseenp makes such statements about a woman @smritiirani . Must be difficult as a woman to see this na ? pic.twitter.com/fES4JqFAtu
